title: 3 and Out - Former #7 Overall Pick Darrius Heyward-Bey on Crushing the Combine, Al Davis Draft Shocker, Misconceptions
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Former #7 Overall Pick Darrius Heyward-Bey on Crushing the Combine, Al Davis Draft Shocker, Misconceptions
description:
In this episode, John sits down with 2009 #7 overall pick Darius Heyward-Bey looks back at his college recruitment, why he chose Maryland, deciding to turn pro, inside the agent selection process, his life-changing NFL combine performance, why he thinks he could have run faster than his 4.30 40, the draft day surprise of getting picked #7 by the Raiders, meeting Al Davis, the chaos at the time in Oakland, why it was important for him to become a key role player with the Steelers.

Follow John on Twitter and SUBSCRIBE now to get all the latest content!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
